SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT203
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This multiple message is sent by or on behalf of the ordering institution directly, or through correspondent(s), to the financial institution(s) of several beneficiary institution(s). The message contains several transactions.
It is used to order the movement of funds to each beneficiary institution.
This message may also contain order(s) for the movement of the Sender's own funds in favour of itself. This is the case when the Receiver services multiple accounts for the Sender and the funds are to be transferred between these accounts. In addition, it can be sent to a financial institution to debit an account of the Sender serviced by the Receiver and to credit an account owned by the Sender at an institution specified in field 57a.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information about BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations . (Error code(s): C05) .

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 The amount in field 19 must equal the sum of the amounts in all occurrences of field 32B (Error code(s): C01).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The amount in field 19 must equal the sum of the amounts in all occurrences of field 32B"

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 The currency code in the amount field 32B must be the same for all occurrences of this field in the message (Error code(s): C02).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency code in the amount field 32B must be the same for all occurrences of this field in the message"

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 If field 56a is present in a transaction, then field 57a must also be present (Error code(s): C81).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 56a is present in a transaction, then field 57a must also be present."

fieldvalidation.name: F-19
fieldvalidation.comment: F-19 The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the currency specified in field 32B (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the currency specified in field 32B."

fieldvalidation.name: F-72-A
fieldvalidation.comment: F-72-A The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]].
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-B
fieldvalidation.comment: The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]].
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-1
fieldvalidation.comment: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "For specific message types, an European currency must not be used as the currency of settlement after a cut-off date (Error Code: E76)."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-2
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI-3
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-1 The repetitive sequence must appear at least twice (Error code(s): T11).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The repetitive sequence must appear at least twice"

fieldvalidation.name: C3-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-2 The repetitive sequence must not appear more than ten times (Error code(s): T10).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The repetitive sequence must not appear more than ten times"

fieldvalidation.name: F-72-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 72 Reject/Return: code word error, or mandatory code word missing, or code word not in the proper sequence, or format 6*35x not satisfied"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Field 72 Reject/Return: code word error, or mandatory code word missing, or code word not in the proper sequence, or format 6*35x not satisfied"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-32B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."
